casebody.data:
GEMBARSKI
v.
PARTSSOURCE, INC. 2018-0125 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 14, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On motion to participate in oral argument scheduled for February 20, 2019, of amicus curiae, Ohio Management Lawyers Association. Motion granted. Amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellant.
